Package order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to orders from different tables.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon
See Also:
